name: DebateAI
description: Dual-AI debate simulator powered by retrieval-augmented generation
fullDescription: DebateAI allows two AI models to engage in structured debates on any user-provided topic. Implemented using a FastAPI backend, Flan-XL model, and RAG pipeline for factual retrieval, the app streams live debates to users via a React front end connected through WebSockets.
features: Simulated debates between AI agents with contextual reasoning
WebSocket-based streaming between backend and frontend
Adjustable debate structure and time controls
Topic embedding with cosine similarity for information retrieval
Fully asynchronous FastAPI backend for low-latency responses
